episodes.title: The Danny Masterson Trial
episodes.description: Actor Danny Masterson was most famous for bringing Hyde to life on That 70’s Show. He also was a very prominent member of scientology. And it was scientology that allowed him to get away with forcible rape for decades. (Allegedly, don’t come for me scientology). - 04:28 - Start of Case 05:18 - Discovery of Case 08:43 - Victim A and Victim B 13:04 - 5 accusers 15:58 - 2019 lawsuit 18:02 - Masterson charged 20:53 - Victim testimonies (graphic) 35:17 - Mistrial 37:10 - Retrial 37:59 - Conviction 38:37 - Ashton Kutcher Mila Kunis character statement 40:33 - Sentencing 43:47 - Bijou divorce scam 45:55 - wrap up - Read the transcripts - Suggest a case  - Logo by Stephanie Solheim from Grow With Meerkat (And my mom) - SOURCES:  https://tonyortega.org/2017/03/03/lapd-probing-scientology-and-danny-masterston-for-multiple-rapes-cover-up/       https://www.huffpost.com/entry/danny-masterson-netflix-executive-rape-allegations_n_5a24b480e4b03c44072e6b97     https://people.com/tv/danny-masterson-church-scientology-sued-sexual-assault-accusers/     https://people.com/tv/danny-masterson-charged-with-raping-3-women/     https://variety.com/2020/tv/news/danny-masterson-rape-case-arraignment-1234774822/     https://people.com/tv/danny-masterson-rape-case-to-move-forward-judge-rules/     https://deadline.com/2021/01/danny-masterson-rape-case-moving-forward-la-da-thomas-mesereau-and-sharon-appelbaum-1234599732/     https://variety.com/2022/tv/news/danny-masterson-rape-accuser-panic-attack-scientology-1235413925/   https://people.com/danny-masterson-convicted-2-counts-rape-7502165https://people.com/danny-masterson-convicted-2-counts-rape-7502165     https://variety.com/2022/tv/news/danny-masterson-no-verdict-jury-deliberations-1235437309/     https://variety.com/2022/tv/news/danny-masterson-no-verdict-jury-deliberations-1235437309/     https://people.com/tv/danny-masterson-charged-rape-timeline-of-allegations/     https://www.eonline.com/news/1350935/the-most-shocking-revelations-from-danny-mastersons-rape-trial     https://www.thecut.com/article/everything-to-know-about-the-danny-masterson-rape-trial.html     https://apnews.com/article/danny-masterson-sentencing-rape-trial-fd7a10eda44d0e3ddde582d4c7053eb6     https://www.eonline.com/news/1350935/the-most-shocking-revelations-from-danny-mastersons-rape-trial     https://www.hollywoodreporter.com/news/general-news/lapd-investigating-danny-masterson-allegations-sexual-assault-982932/     https://www.nytimes.com/2023/09/07/arts/television/danny-masterson-rape-trial-sentencing.html?smtyp=cur&smid=tw-nytimes
